trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关的设计时视觉支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartDesigner class provides the visual representation for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: WebPartDesigner 类提供的可视表示形式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在设计时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: It is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner> class and adds validation to verify that the associated control is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or derived type.
trans-unit.target: 派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>类并添加验证以验证关联的控件是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件或派生的类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner>

trans-unit.source: WebPartDesigner inherits a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property from its parent that is always set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: WebPartDesigner 继承<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>从始终设置为其父级的属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes the visual design environment to generate a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> control to hold a temporary copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> on the design surface; this copy is then persisted into markup.
trans-unit.target: 这将导致可视设计环境来生成<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>控件以容纳的临时副本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在设计图面，则此副本然后保存到标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View>

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to return `false`, the visual design environment generates markup directly from the actual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果你重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>属性以返回`false`，可视设计环境中的实际直接生成标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.PartDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Web Parts designers generally act much like regular control designers; the principal methods for setting design-time appearance derive from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件设计器通常作用类似常规控件设计器;用于设置设计时外观的主体方法派生<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method to change the design-time markup associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，你可以重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法可以更改与控件关联的设计时标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can likewise override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> methods to handle errors and empty strings (""), respectively.
trans-unit.target: 你可以同样重写<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法来处理错误和空字符串 ("")，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetErrorDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDesigner"></xref> class.
Binds the designer to a control and validates that the control is a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 将设计器绑定到控件和验证控件是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control associated with this designer.
